content: the perfect mini gift bag for small things like jewellery gift cards sweets etc it is a beginner friendly mosaic design as there are no special stitches just single_crochet and double_crochet the blue background only used 70m and the white used 43m of catona yarn so less than one 50g ball of each colour one gift bag using scheepes catona yarn and a 2 5mm hook measures 16 5 cm x 11 cm 6 ½ x 4 ¼ not including the bottom edging pattern contains written instructions mosaic chart and a link to my video for the join it is worked in the round like a tube included are instructions on mosaic overlay techniques and chart reading if this is your first mosaic project you will find many youtube videos if you need further help search for beginners guide to mosaic crochet when choosing yarn it is important to choose contrasting colours so the pattern stands out the designs in my other pattern christmas mug rugs are the same size as the mosaic section in this pattern so they can easily be used for mini gift bags https //ravel me/mosaic-christmas-mug-rugs
